unnormalised: ### Mhakaank Patrak Ek Hasyalekhan Polle Upraant: Mhoji Vidhyavishayak Katha
normalised: ### Jheva Marksheet Ek Comedy Script Bhaxen Vachta: Mhoji Academic Katha

unnormalised: Tor, Natije bhair aileat. Portun ekda. Ani mhaka sangunk di, mhoje mhakaank patrak sodanch ek vinodacho zhari asat, chodd korun dusreank, ani kadanch mhaka, ek bollvont chahache kop upraant. Hea velarui venglle nasle. Hanvem mhaji nirasha adinch keli, portalant login kelem, ani mhaka toyar kelo.
normalised: Toka, results aileat. Portun. Ani mhaka sangonk di, mhoje marksheets sodanch vinodacho zornam zaun asat, chodd korun dusreank, ani kednam tor mhaka svotak, ek dhoklli chae pielea uprant. Hea vellakui kainch vegllem naslem. Hanvem mhoji niraxa fuddem dhakli, portal-ant login kelem, ani svotak toiar kelo.

unnormalised: Poilo: Gonnit. 38/100. Hanv shapath gheta, ank ani mhaje eka avghad sambandh asat. Tem koxem ek karkun doryachem porchem gharache bhair sodanch tujim kamam sangunk tharta tench bhaxen. Hanv nischit asan ki porikshek lagim daya asli; natar, hanv ek vhodd fatt 0 dixit astam, ji, kiteak, hanvem calculus purnne rupan kitleam pavtim somzoli. #MathsIsMyNemesis #ThankGodForGraceMarks
normalised: Poileach pavtt: Ganit. Eka xekddeak battun tees atth. Hanv xepot gheun sangtam, ankdden ani mhojem ek zatelponachem natem asa. Tem toxem zata jem tumche bhonvatichi kakui tumchea vixim soglleank kiteak sangta tem somzonk sodtat te bhaxen. Mhojea khatrean, porixekhonnarachem kalliz pigholl'lem; noxtor, hanv ek vhodd fat ziro polltolo aslo, zo kednach sampurnn calculus somzol'lem na tem dakhoita. hash Ganit Mhojem Dusman hash Devan Doya Dakhoili Dekhun Dhanyvad

unnormalised: Magir asa Bhautikshastra: 42/100. Eka thoddi sudharna, kiteak hanvem Taj Mahala bhaxen dista tashi ek circuit diagram barobar kaddli. Hanv nischit na. Kaim zalear porikshek lagim ek boro dis aslo. Hanv upeksen ki tem tech aslem! Punn hanv nischit asan ki Newtonui kaim kiteak torui thoddi lajek poddla. Mhaji aai sangta, "Beta, kamit kamit tunvem pas keli." Dhanyavad, Aai, tem oxem sangtale bhaxen asa "Kaim zalear ghar purnne rupan bhazle na."
normalised: Uprant Physics asa: eka xekddeak battun challis don. Thoddi sudharonn, toxench hanvem Taj Mahal polleunk dista toslem ek circuit diagram chukichem korun kaddlem. Hanv nischit na. Zenna porixekhonnaracho dis boro aslo astolo. Hanv as korun asa! Punn mhaka nischit zalea ki Newton-ui kiteim tori vhaddleak hanstant marun gheto astolo. Mhoji auy mhonnta, "Beta, tunvem pass korun ghetlem." Dhanyvad, Auy, tem mhonntat, "At least ghor sampurnn ponnanim bhazun gheunk na."

unnormalised: Inglez, mhojem surakshit sthan, ek zaskachem 65/100 favo zalem. Distta ki mhaji rachnuk ghatnanchi takdik asat velean kamacher samarpann divunk naslulem karannank torar korunk. Mhaka virodh naslo. Mhoje vyakhyatak Prof. Sharmak ek sandeshui lilele asle, kaim torui hanv ek vyavsayik blogger zanvum shaktai ashi, mhojem bapaik dukh zatlem punn poiso toch asta!
normalised: English, mhojem suraxit sthan, kiteim tori ek xekddeak battun sat xesti ponchvis dilem. Disant, hanvem vellachea adim assaignament divonk na dekhun mhaka bore bore utram mell'lle. Mhojea vixim nischit asa. Mhojea upadhyay P-r-o-f. Sharma-n bhavikponnacher ek tiponni boroili, poryayantor, hanv zori ek zannkar blogger zaunk xokta? Mhojea bapain nirax zaunk xokta punn poishe tor ekuch zatat!

unnormalised: Rasayan shastra? Ek thos 50/100. Udasin. Ek barobar santulit rasayanik utpannachem bhaxen, mhaji bhavna hea vishayak nasleli. Hanvem kaim rupakayanchi formula dhondunk favo zalem mhaka purnne rupan laje na kela. Hanv nischit asan ki hanv gharantlem saf korpacheo vastu mix korunk favo zalem tor, punn hanvem azun poroshan vaprunk tharlam.
normalised: Rasayan? Ek xekddeak battun ek solid ponchvis. Xanti. Ek borea ponnanim santulit rasainik somikronn bhaxen, mhojim bhavnam hea vixoiacher kainch nant. Hanvem kiteim tori formulanchem smoron dhorun mhaka sampurnnponnanim lhajik korun ghena. Hanv zori kiteim ghorea nirmolleachim utpadnam ek vaett vostun bhitor mixrunk xoktam, punn atam meren hanvem dhorun dovorlam.

unnormalised: Bachav zaito zalela? Hindi. Ek shandar 88/100. Siddh kelem ki hanv, vishvas ghetlean, kaim kiteak favo zatai. Kitli vorsa bollivudachim chitram dhorun ani mhaji nani sangatim gap marun poiso favo kelo. Konn zanno? Zanno zalear, hanvem Bollywood screen play likhun dita.
normalised: Bachavochi dorya? Hindi. Ek xekddeak battun ek vhodd ashti-asti. Prove ki hanv kiteim tori boreponnan korun divonk xoktam. Kollunk ailem ki vorsan vorsam Bollywood-ache film polleunk ani mhojea nanivangodde gossiping korun poixe mellovpachem kam korun gheunche. Konn zannam? Zori mhaka Bollywood-achem screenplay lekhunk dhorchem?

unnormalised: Sadar sari: "Kaim zalear vaait asle, kaim zalear bore asle." Mhaji maitrai, zaskachem rupan, mhaka sooddunk na (azun). Mhoje ixttanim "utkarshak" partiyechi yojnna keli (dhaya partyechem). Ani hanv? Hanv ithe asa, ek ani shikshaniche vorsaache darshanik bhoy dhorun, nirantar chayache kupanim ani ek thodde ashechen jivem gheun ki kaim zalear puro, fuddla velar, mhakaank patrak ek hasyakaramachem yashachi katha polltalem, ani kaim zalear ek dukhest hasyakara katha nhui. #IndianEducationSystem #MarksheetTales
normalised: Soglleamni mellun utponn: kiteim tori "vaett zaunk xokta, borem zaunk xokta." Mhojea avoi-bapain mhaka dur korunk na (azun). Mhoje ixtt "sovechheak" utsov (vach: kallzacho utsov) yojunk lagleat. Ani hanv? Hanv fottichea avixkarachi bhirant polleun eka academika vorosak, chaeche vhodd dhoklleanim ani kiteim tori umed divpi umed zaunk zai, zor tor fuddlach vella marksheet ek comedy-che yoxachem ani ek dukho-vinodachi kotha zaunk zai. hash Bharoti Xikxon Vyostha hash Marksheetanchim Kathnam
